Proud to have @ShareOur endorse my bill, the FEED Act to help connect vulnerable families and children with healthy meals and support restaurants and small family farmers who need help right now.

THREAD: The House just passed the third Coronavirus response bill, which represents a critical compromise between both parties whose Members came together in light of the Coronavirus pandemic.
